epd-plugin.SARC: Archive editor with nested editing support

totk-plugin.zStandard: zStandard decompression and compression using the TotK dictionaries
totk-plugin.RSTB/RESTBL: Provides strings for all versions of TotK up to 1.2.1

planned.BARS: Basic archive IO features and audio sampler
planned.BFRES: Basic I/O, texture viewing, basic sub-file editor
planned.SARC Searching: Nested file searching in SARC archives
